body: Heeeeyyy guys, so title says it all. Doesnt matter whether its a weekend, schoolday or even holiday....LOOKING forward to replies!!
body_tagged: Heeeeyyy guys, so title says it all. Doesnt matter whether its a weekend, schoolday or even holiday....LOOKING forward to replies!!
title: Your daily routine! (With times if possible)

replies.body:
6:00 AM: Wake up and get ready for school.
7:00 AM: Arrive to school.
10:20 AM: We get a break. I stalk my crush and talk with my friends.
11:00 AM: Break is over.
1:00 PM: Get out of school. I spend some time with my friends until they all leave.
1:30 PM: School bus arrives. I go back home.
2:00 PM: I arrive home and eat lunch.
2:30 PM: Shower.
3:00 PM: Sleep.
3:00 PM: In case I don't sleep, I do Avicus related stuff or play games.
4:00-5:00 PM: Wake up. I do Avicus related stuff or play games.
6:30-7:00 PM: I do my homework while and take a couple breaks to do Avicus stuff or play games.
12:00 AM: Finish homework. Watch videos and listen to music on my iPod.
1:00-2:00 AM: Sleep.

replies.body:
6:40 Wake up
7:10 Breakfast
7:10 - 7:55 free time
7:55 - 8:00 Getting ready for school
8:20 - 13.05, 14:35 or 15:55 in school, then straight home
17:00 - 19:00 waiting for dinner, free time = computer shit/ going outside
19:00 more free time
20:30 I do my homework
22:00 sauna & shower
23:00 - 23:30 To sleep
And repeat

replies.body:
6:30 AM: Wake up and get ready for school.
7:15 AM: Go to the schoolbus.
7:50: School starts.
11:00 - 12:00 AM: Lunch.
12:00 - 12:50 AM: Break is over.
1:50 - 3:30 PM - School's over.
(Depends on which day) - 4:30 PM: Homework.
4:45 - 7:30 PM: Football/Soccer or Floorball.
8:00 - 10:00 PM: Chill.
10:00 - 11:00 PM: Sleep.

replies.body:
6:45am: Wake up and have brekkie.
7:00am: Go to school.
7:30am: School starts.

------------------------------

3:00pm: School ends.
3-5pm: Steelband.
5:00pm: Arrive home, do chores and homework.
6:00pm: Dinner.
6-8pm: Homework.
8-9:15pm: Free time.
9:30pm: Getting ready for bed.
9:30-10:00pm: Listen to music in bed.
10:00pm: Sleep.

replies.body:
6:20 AM: Wake up
6:30 AM: Finally out of my room
6:30 AM-6:50 AM: Eat breakfast
6:50 AM - 7:00 AM: Watch the forums and find out what happened over night
7:00 AM - 7:05 AM: Put my laptop in my laptop bag and make my hair
7:07 AM - 7:10 AM: Get my shoes and whatever else I need on and get in my moms car
7:10 AM - 7:14 AM: Drive to public bus station and get on the bus
7:15 AM - 7:50 AM: Arrives at school
7:50 AM - 8:14 AM: A break
8:15 AM - 2:25 PM (tuesdays & fridays 4:00 PM): School
2:25 PM (or 4:00 PM) - 3:20 PM or 5:10 PM: Gets on public bus and goes to first bus station
3:20 PM or 5:10 PM - 3:30 PM or 5:20 PM: Walks home from station
3:30 PM or 5:20 PM - 10:30 PM : Procrastinates and plays MC, Prison architect, CS:GO, Mount and Blade: Warband, Osu or if needed I actually do work
10:30 PM - 12:30 PM: I stalk forums in between breaks of watching shows/youtube.
12:30 PM - 6:20 PM: Sleep
Repeat

12:30 PM - 6:20 PM: Sleep
Repeat

replies.body:
5:00 AM - Wake up
5:10 AM - Actually get out of bed
5:15 AM - Breakfast & Relax on couch
5:35 AM - Play my DS for a little bit
6:00 AM - Do my hair
6:45 AM - DS
7:00 AM - Check up on forums
7:15 AM - Either continue posting on forums, or decide what clothes to wear to school
~7:20-7:30 AM - Either finish up posting on forums, decide what clothes to wear to school, or get dressed.
~7:35-7:45 AM - Play DS until 7:50 AM
7:50 AM - Go to school

Ok school time
8:05 AM - Arrive at school, go to lockers
8:06 AM - Get to locker, go to class
8:10 AM - Drop off stuff, visit friends until class
8:20 AM - Go back to class
9:40 AM - Class 1 ends, go to Class 2
9:45 AM - Class 2 starts
11:05 AM - Class 2 ends, lunch time!
11:05 AM - Go to locker to get lunch
11:06 AM - Wait for friends to arrive
11:10 AM - Go outside with friends and walk around the school while eating
11:35 AM - Realize class is in 10 minutes, and run inside to get ready for class
11:43 AM - Arrive at Class 3
1:00 PM - Class 3 ends, go to class 4
1:04 PM - Class 4 starts. Awaiting end of the day.
2:20 PM - Class 4 ends, I go to my locker.
2:23 PM - Arrive at locker and wait for friends.
2:30 PM - Chat with friends before leaving the school.

Home time !!
3:00 PM - Arrive at home. Time to play games!
4:30 PM - Finish up playing DS games. 
4:50 PM - Eat dinner. Time for more games!
6:30 PM - Done playing games. Shower time!
7:15 PM - Done showering, time for YouTube!
9:30 PM - Done YouTube. Time to sleep!
9:45 PM - Fall asleep.

Repeat every school day~ Weekends are a lot easier, haha. The schedule usually doesn't change that much, but occasionally there's minor changes to the times. o3o

replies.body:
Wake up 20 minutes before school starts. Go to the bathroom and browse Avi forums and 9GAG. realize There's 10 minutes till school starts. Wipes ass, gets out of bathroom and gets dressed, brushes teeth, eats breakfast and prepares lunch in 5 minutes. MOM STILL ISNT READY. I'm late for school. Teacher screams at me. Go on with my life. School finishes and I go home. I eat, then do homework. Then I secretly play MC because my parents are paranoid and don't let me play during weekdays (I dont get bad grades btw). Thats on a weekday.

On a weekend day, I get up, go to karate, get back to house, take a shower and get dressed. Binge MC for 4 hours then go to an Armenian activity (where we learn about our history and stuff. Its the only activity I'm excited to go to).
Get back home, and do homework. On sunday exact same thing except for no Armenian activity
replies.body_tagged:

School finishes and I go home. I eat, then do homework. Then I secretly play MC because my parents are paranoid and don't let me play during weekdays (I dont get bad grades btw). Thats on a weekday.

On a weekend day, I get up, go to karate, get back to house, take a shower and get dressed. Binge MC for 4 hours then go to an Armenian activity (where we learn about our history and stuff. Its the only activity I'm excited to go to).
Get back home, and do homework. On sunday exact same thing except for no Armenian activity

replies.body:
7:00AM Get Up (Breakfast, Feed Bog, Watch TV)
8:00AM Check Avicus Forums, Facebook, YouTube Views and Comments from today's video)
8:30AM Edit Videos
10:00AM Render Videos
10:00AM-1PM: Watch TV or YouTube
1PM: Record videos (Weather on a Server or on Avicus)
3PM: School Children Come home
3:30PM: Create thumbnails for videos and possibly record more videos
4:30PM: Record with Glesmon OR Avicus 
6:00PM: Dinner and Socialization
7:30PM: Post new Update on Facebook Page and Check Facebook and Chat to People
8:00PM: Prepare 4 Videos for YouTube Upload and Watch TV
8:00PM-11:00PM: Play Minecraft, Watch TV, Other Important Tasks to finish the day
11:00PM- Goto Sleep

And Repeat...

And Repeat...

9:40 AM - Class 1 ends, go to Class 2
9:45 AM - Class 2 starts
11:05 AM - Class 2 ends, lunch time!
11:05 AM - Go to locker to get lunch
11:06 AM - Wait for friends to arrive
11:10 AM - Go outside with friends and walk around the school while eating
11:35 AM - Realize class is in 10 minutes, and run inside to get ready for class
11:43 AM - Arrive at Class 3
1:00 PM - Class 3 ends, go to class 4
1:04 PM - Class 4 starts. Awaiting end of the day.
2:20 PM - Class 4 ends, I go to my locker.
2:23 PM - Arrive at locker and wait for friends.
2:30 PM - Chat with friends before leaving the school.

Home time !!
3:00 PM - Arrive at home. Time to play games!
4:30 PM - Finish up playing DS games. 
4:50 PM - Eat dinner. Time for more games!
6:30 PM - Done playing games. Shower time!
7:15 PM - Done showering, time for YouTube!
9:30 PM - Done YouTube. Time to sleep!
9:45 PM - Fall asleep.

Repeat every school day~ Weekends are a lot easier, haha. The schedule usually doesn't change that much, but occasionally there's minor changes to the times. o3o

replies.body:
7AM - Wake up, get ready for school (Includes listening to music, Netflix, doing homework, taking a shower, brushing teeth, no breakfast though)
7:45AM - Walk to the bus stop, wait for the bus
7:55 - 8:00AM - Bus is here
8:10AM - Get to school
8:18AM - School starts
8:18 - 10AM - First block (Wednesday - 8:18 - 9:51AM)
Wednesday - Homeroom (9:57 - 10:13)
10:06 - 11:41AM - Second Block (Wednesday - 10:18 - 11:47)
11:47AM - 1:47PM - Third Block (Wednesday - 11:53 - 1:53)
1:52 - 3:30PM - Fourth Block (Wednesday - 1:59 - 3:30)
Lunch for Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, Friday - 1:17 - 1:47PM
Lunch for Wednesday - 1:23 - 1:53PM
3:30PM - School is over
4PM - Get on bus, walk home with friends
5PM - Netflix
6PM - Eat dinner
7 - 8PM - Netflix / Minecraft
8 - 10PM - Homework
10 - 11PM - Sleep. Usually have to wake up to finish homework, which is what I am suppose to be doing right now. :p

My weekends do vary a LOT.
